## Map peaks to motifs
```{r}
library(motifmatchr)
opts <- list()
opts[["tax_group"]] <- "vertebrates"
opts[["collection"]] <- "CORE"
opts[["all_versions"]] <- F # Only include the latest version of a motif
motifs_to_scan <- getMatrixSet(JASPAR2022, opts)
?matchMotifs

peak_ranges <- rowRanges(atac_count)
peak_ranges 
```
